title: CBC Comedy
text:
Now that the election is over, it's time to do the real work of making sense of it. Or making fun of it. Here are the best reactions to the biggest moments, from debates and scandals to the Liberal win. On the campaign trail Here it is from the beginning. Let's introduce our leaders: STOP talking shit about different Canadian party leaders.

Justin Trudeau is ICONIC

Andrew Scheer is HARD WORKING

Jagmeet Singh is INSPIRING

Maxime Bernier

Elizabeth May is CUTTING EDGE —@22_Minutes When the world reacted to Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's blackface scandal: Trudeau just took a DNA testhttps://t.co/ixf43v51W0 pic.twitter.com/hXU1v7plPM —@TheDailyShow We feel you, Mark: This election makes me want to drink. Full clip on next week’s 22 Minutes. #Elexn43 #CanadaElection2019 #cdnelxn2019 #cdnpoli https://t.co/CBqdhQQyyw —@markcritch He's not the only one who needed a drink. Every party has equally cringey photo-ops but something about a grown man toasting with a *beer* glass full of milk is particularly jarring. pic.twitter.com/SRSkIko1cG —@VictorDYoung A photo of Andrew Scheer drinking milk in a beer glass prompted others to do the same. We didn't know who was going to win the election, but we knew who won social media: cancel #elxn43, he's already won pic.twitter.com/T6s90JV6a0 —@sashakalra The parties as social media platforms: #CDNPOLI SOCIAL MEDIA:

Weirdly anticlimactic wins —@gabrielledrolet welp, we know he's got experience performing as a minority https://t.co/JZdNfPgWn0 —@TheSunnyDhillon Then again, many Canadians saw this as the real win: Maxime Bernier has lost his seat in Beauce. Let's take a look back at all his best moments as People's Party leader: #elxn43 pic.twitter.com/hokaVOVecc —@22_Minutes I will never ever get over the fact that the Rhinocerous Party ran a candidate named Maxime Bernier as a joke in the same riding as actual Maxime Bernier.

This is a good night to revisit @jacoblorinc's great coverage of the whole thing. https://t.co/ejNytrybjV pic.twitter.com/DBVXKmjyLj —@gabrielledrolet This eloquent tweet sums things up: I don’t want to go all political scientist on you folks, but this election was, as we say in the biz, fucked up. #elxn43 —@David_Moscrop You can catch This Hour Has 22 Minutes post-election episode on CBC TV at 8:30pm (9NT) or stream it on CBC Gem .
description: Here are the best reactions to the biggest moments from the campaign to election night.
